title: Working with the Image Widget
description: Master Elementor's Image widget to add and style images on your website.

blocks.content: The Image widget is essential for adding visual content to your website. Learn how to use it effectively to create stunning visual layouts.

Key capabilities of the Image widget:

  • Image upload and selection
  • Size and alignment controls
  • Lightbox functionality
  • Custom URL linking
  • Alt text for SEO

Enhance your images with these effects:

  • Hover animations
  • CSS filters
  • Border and shadow styling
  • Opacity controls
  • Custom masks and shapes
